points.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des conditions.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: Your personal data is not sold

case.title: Your personal data is not sold
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles ne sont pas vendues
case.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

case.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
case.localized_title: Vous acceptez de défendre, d'indemniser et de dégager le service de toute responsabilité en cas de réclamation liée à votre utilisation du service.

points.title: Private messages can be read

case.title: Private messages can be read
case.localized_title: Les messages privés peuvent être lus
case.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.

points.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

case.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
case.localized_title: Ce service vous permet de récupérer une archive de vos données
case.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.

case.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.
case.localized_title: Au lieu de vous le demander directement, ce service présumera que vous avez donné votre consentement en fonction de l'usage que vous en faites.
case.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.

points.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
points.analysis: Bumble Trading Inc reserve the right at our sole discretion to terminate or suspend any Account, or make use of any operational, technological, legal or other means available to enforce the Terms (including without limitation blocking specific IP addresses), at any time without liability and without the need to give you prior notice.

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer votre compte sans préavis et sans raison.
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par des balises web, des pixels de suivi, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.analysis: You'll have great fun on Bumble, but if you feel the need to leave, you can delete your Account at any time by going to the 'Settings' page when you are logged in and clicking on the 'Delete account' link. Your Account will be deleted immediately but it may take a little while for Your Content to be completely removed from the App.

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.localized_title: Vous avez le droit de quitter ce service à tout moment
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.

case.title: You waive your right to a class action.
case.localized_title: Vous renoncez à votre droit à une action collective.
case.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.

points.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par les cookies/pixels des médias sociaux.
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online

case.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
case.localized_title: Vous êtes informé des risques liés à la publication d'informations personnelles en ligne

points.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Des informations sont fournies sur la manière dont vos données personnelles sont utilisées
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: This service has a no refund policy with some exceptions

case.title: This service has a no refund policy with some exceptions
case.localized_title: Ce service est soumis à une politique de non-remboursement, à quelques exceptions près
case.description: Payments can be refunded if some requirements are fulfilled.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

case.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
case.localized_title: Ce service peut collecter, utiliser et partager des données de localisation
case.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

case.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
case.localized_title: Le fournisseur de services ne garantit pas un service ininterrompu, opportun, sûr ou exempt d'erreurs.
case.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

points.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

case.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
case.localized_title: Un mécanisme de réclamation est prévu pour le traitement des données à caractère personnel.
case.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user or $100

case.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
case.localized_title: Toute responsabilité au nom du service est limitée aux frais que vous avez payés en tant qu'utilisateur ou à 100 $.

points.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

case.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
case.localized_title: Vous acceptez de ne pas soumettre de contenu diffamatoire, harcelant ou menaçant.
case.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.

points.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

case.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
case.localized_title: Le service prétend être conforme à la CCPA pour les utilisateurs californiens.
case.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

case.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
case.localized_title: Le service est fourni "en l'état" et doit être utilisé à vos risques et périls.
case.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

points.title: You are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.
points.analysis:
Under the header "There is certain content we can’t allow on Bumble"
We want our users to be able express themselves as much as possible and post all sorts of things on Bumble, but we have to impose restrictions on certain content which:
Impersonates any other person, including falsely stating your name.

case.title: You are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.
case.localized_title: Vous n'êtes pas autorisé à utiliser des pseudonymes, car la confiance et la transparence entre les utilisateurs en ce qui concerne leur identité sont importantes pour le service.
case.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed, but it makes sense for the purposes of this service.

points.title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services

case.title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services
case.localized_title: Ce service peut utiliser votre contenu pour tous ses services existants et futurs.

points.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

case.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
case.localized_title: Le service prétend être conforme au GDPR pour les utilisateurs européens.
case.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

case.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
case.localized_title: Vos données peuvent être traitées et stockées partout dans le monde
case.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

points.title: This service is only available to users over 18 years old

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service est réservé aux utilisateurs âgés de plus de 18 ans.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time

case.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
case.localized_title: Les journaux sont conservés pendant une période indéfinie.
case.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that may keep logs indefinitely, allowing user sessions to be tracked over time. Logs that are kept for a time "consistent with applicable law" also fall under this case, since this period of time may be murky or undefined.

points.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

case.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
case.localized_title: Il est conseillé de consulter régulièrement les conditions d'utilisation, bien qu'en cas de changements importants, le service en informera les utilisateurs.
case.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.

points.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont utilisées pour faire de la publicité ciblée par des tiers.
case.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

points.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

case.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
case.localized_title: Il n'est pas permis d'explorer le site, de le parcourir ou d'y accéder par des moyens automatisés.
